songs.title: Don’t Let Me Down (Dom Da Bomb & Electric Bodega Mixshow Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Refrain: Daya]
So don't let me down
Don't let me down
Don't let me down

[Intro: Konshens]
Baby girl
I make you fly high
Never let you down

[Verse 1: Daya & Konshens]
Crashing, hit a wall
Right now I need a miracle (need a miracle)
Hurry up now, I need a miracle (my girl, tell me, don't you need a miracle?)
Stranded, reaching out
I call your name, but you're not around
I say your name, but you're not around

[Chorus: Daya & Konshens]
Oh yeah
I need you, I need you, I need you right now
Yeah, I need you right now
So don't let me, don't let me, don't let me down
I think I'm losing my mind now
It's in my head, darling, I hope
That you'll be here, when I need you the most
So don't let me, don't let me, don't let me down
D-don't let me down
Don't let me down

[Post-Chorus: Konshens]
Bump this
Bump this
We can fly higher when you feel and touched it
Open
Open
Open up your eye to receive my love

[Verse 2: Konshens]
Champion lover never let you down
Team turn up when we come around
Girl you'll feel a smile if I make you frown
You are my baby girl

[Verse 3: Daya & Konshens]
Running out of time
I really thought you were on my side
But now there's nobody by my side (nobody, nobody)

[Chorus: Daya & Konshens]
I need you, I need you, I need you right now (need you)
Yeah, I need you right now (yeah)
So don't let me, don't let me, don't let me down
I think I'm losing my mind now
It's in my head, darling, I hope
That you'll be here, when I need you the most
So don't let me, don't let me, don't let me down
D-don't let me down

[Verse 4: Konshens]
Just give me your money my girl
And I promise I'll take care of it
Rude boy [?]
Treat you like a queen, like a princess the heiress
Anything you need, name it, here it

[Bridge: Konshens & Daya]
Champion lover never let you down
Team turn up when we come around
Girl, you'll feel a smile if I make you frown
You are my baby girl
Champion lover never let you down
Team turn up when we come around (Ooh, I think I'm losing my mind now, yeah)
Girl, you'll feel a smile if I make you frown
You are my baby girl (Ooh, I think I'm losing my mind now, yeah)

[Chorus: Daya & Konshens]
I need you, I need you, I need you right now
Yeah, I need you right now (need you)
So don't let me, don't let me, don't let me down (don't let me down)
I think I'm losing my mind now
It's in my head, darling, I hope
That you'll be here, when I need you the most
So don't let me, don't let me, don't let me down
D-don't let me down
Don't let me down

[Post-Chorus: Konshens & Daya]
Konshens (Yeah, don't let me down)
Chainsmokers
Bom da Bomb (Yeah, don't let me down)
Electric Bodega
Don't let me down, oh no
Say don't let me down
Don't let me down, no-o
Don't let me down

[Bridge: Konshens & Daya]
Champion lover never let you down (Don't let me down, down, down)
No no, no
I won't
